name: Tackle
description: The monster charges at the opponent with great force.

name: Scratch
description: The monster uses its sharp claws to scratch the opponent.

name: Slam
description: The monster slams its body into the opponent with incredible strength.

name: Quick Attack
description: The monster moves at incredible speed to strike the opponent first.

name: Ember Wave
description: Blasts the opponent with a wave of scorching embers.

name: Flame Burst
description: Creates an explosion of fiery energy.

name: Inferno Pulse
description: Unleashes a powerful pulse of inferno, dealing massive fire damage to the opponent.

name: Blaze Strike
description: Charges into the opponent with fiery speed, causing great damage.

name: Aqua Blast
description: Shoots a powerful burst of pressurized water at the opponent with good power and accuracy.

name: Tidal Surge
description: Summons a surging wave of water to crash into the opponent, dealing moderate damage.

name: Hydro Strike
description: Executes a precise and powerful strike with water's energy.

name: Torrential Rush
description: Charges at the opponent with the force of a raging river.

name: Vine Whip
description: Strikes the opponent with long, whip-like vines, delivering a swift and accurate attack.

name: Leaf Blade
description: Empowers the Linemon's blade-like leaves to execute a precise and powerful strike.

name: Photosynthesis Beam
description: Harnesses the power of sunlight to release a beam of energy.

name: Thorn Strike
description: Fires sharp thorns at the opponent.

name: Shock Bolt
description: Fires a bolt of electric energy at the opponent.

name: Thunder Strike
description: Executes a precise and powerful electric strike.

name: Electroshock Wave
description: Unleashes a powerful wave of electric energy.

name: Zap Charge
description: Charges at the opponent with electrifying speed.

name: Earthquake
description: Causes the ground to shake violently.

name: Sandstorm Strike
description: Strikes the opponent with a sandstorm-infused attack.

name: Tremor Wave
description: Creates a powerful wave of seismic energy.

name: Digging Strike
description: Digs into the ground and emerges to strike the opponent.

name: Gust Blow
description: Unleashes a powerful gust of wind at the opponent.

name: Whirlwind Strike
description: Strikes the opponent with a whirlwind-infused attack.

name: Air Slicer
description: Creates sharp slices of compressed air, dealing a precise and powerful strike.

name: Zephyr Charge
description: Charges at the opponent with the speed of a zephyr, delivering a moderate damage.

name: Poison Punch
description: Attacks the opponent with a powerful punch covered in poison.

name: Punch Shower
description: Punchs the opponent several times.
